definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Plane geometry exam, one problem is drawing, I'm not accurate.
sentences.chinese: 平面幾何考試，有一道題是畫圖，我畫得不夠精確。

sentences.english: Three of Archimedes' extant works are devoted to plane geometry.
sentences.chinese: 阿基米德現存的三部著作都是獻給平面幾何的。

sentences.english: The plane geometry is one of middle school mathematics basic contents.
sentences.chinese: 平面幾何是中學數學的基本內容之一。

sentences.english: This paper lists the transformation of thinking in junior school plane geometry application.
sentences.chinese: 本文列舉了轉化思想在初中平面幾何中的應用。

sentences.english: The circle-power theorem is one of important theorems in plane geometry.
sentences.chinese: 圓冪定理是初中平面幾何《圓》中重要定理之一。

sentences.english: Plane geometry is fun to study.
sentences.chinese: 平面幾何的學習是有趣的。
